title: FEAR - The Record (olde_punks)
description:
From Wiki:

Recorded 	December 1981
Genre 	Punk rock
Length 	27:44
Label 	Slash
Producer Fear, Gary Lubow



The Record was the debut album by Los Angeles punk rock band Fear, released in 1982
